text: Ili by ne govorili: "Yesli by byla nisposlana nam kniga, to my byli by na boleye pryamom puti, chem oni!" Prishlo uzhe k vam yasnoye znameniye ot Gospoda vashego, i rukovodstvo, i milost'; kto zhe boleye nespravedliv, chem tot, kto schitayet lozh'yu znameniya Allakha i otvorachivayetsya ot nikh! My vozdadim tem, kotoryye otvrashchayutsya ot nashikh znameniy, zlym nakazaniyem za to, chto oni otvrashchalis'
